text: (atarku) nir kuruviraka: Pumiyil (manitarkalukkup patilaka) vanavarkale vacittiruntu, atil avarkal nim'matiyaka natantu tirintu kontumiruntal namum vanattiliruntu (avarkal inattaic carnta) oru vanavaraiye (nam) tutaraka avarkalitam anuppiyiruppom. (Akave, manitarkalakiya avarkalitam manitarakiya um'mai nam tutaraka anuppiyatil tavaronrumillai)
